root.name: Disciples III: Resurrection
root.description: OverviewDisciples III: Resurrection is a Role-Playing / Strategy game developed by Russian studio, Akella. The game reintroduces the Undead Hordes back into the series as a playable faction. The game attempts to address some of the balance issues in its direct predecessor, Disciples III: Renaissance, as well as introducing a new campaign, new quests and unit types. The game was originally an add-on for the Russian version of Renaissance, titled "Resurrection of Mortis".FeaturesThe story for Resurrection was written by Ekaterina Stadnikova, who has previously written a number of novels based on the Disciples series. The game itself is to feature over 70 hours of gameplay, as well as introducing two major storyline characters, over 50 new units, as well as a rebalancing of the AI and difficulty settings.System RequirementsMinimum:OS: Windows XP (SP2) / Vista / windows 7Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2 GHz / AMD Athlon 64 3000+Memory: 1 GB RAMHard Disk Space: 10 GBVideo Card: 512 MB nVidia GeForce 6800 GT / ATI Radeon 9800Recommended:OS: Windows XP (SP2) / Vista / Windows 7Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 3.0 GHz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 6000+ (or better)Memory: 4 GB RAMHard Disk Space: 10 GBVideo Card: 512 MB nVidia GeForce 8800 GTS / ATI Radeon x1800 (or better)
